reviews.name: LeapFrog: Letter Factory (Handlebox Packaging) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My son watched this video not even once a day for a week and had learned his letters. He now tells us what letters are which and even what sounds they make. If he gets to watch a movie this is the one he asks for the most! He is about a month shy of 3 years old.
reviews.title: AWESOME

reviews.name: LeapFrog: Letter Factory (Handlebox Packaging) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I taught elementary school for 22 years and I think it is a great video for teaching the correct letter sounds.
reviews.title: My 2 year old enjoyed watching the video.

reviews.name: LeapFrog: Letter Factory (Handlebox Packaging) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying this dvd for kids for years. My current daughter does not watch tv so I was not sure she would like it but I can turn it on and walk out the door without her wailing. And they learn the letters and signs very quickly.
reviews.title: Love It!

reviews.name: LeapFrog: Letter Factory (Handlebox Packaging) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old loves this! Even my 6 year old and 2 year old. Very fun DVD even I have been singing the songs that go with it. I purchased it after it was very highly recommended to me by 2 of my friends. Walmart had to best price!
reviews.title: fun way to learn

reviews.name: LeapFrog: Letter Factory (Handlebox Packaging) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
We have always had LeapFrog:Letter Factory in our family. We discovered it when our oldest, now 16 years old, was 4 years old. Eight children (ages 16 to 15 months) and 12 years later, we still highly recommend this DVD. We had to repurchase because our old one had gotten scratched up.

We homeschool, so every day during the 3, 4 and 5 year old age range each of our children would enjoy Leap Frog as part of their daily school time.

After we saw that they clearly could recognized their letters, write their letters and identify the sounds of their letters with Letter Factory, we then moved on to Leap Frog: Code Caper.

All of our children have learned to read or will learn to read with the help of Leap Frog: Letter Factory and Code Caper. :)

With the engaging music, the funny way to learn the phonics of each letter and the story line helps to make learning phonics fun, easy and effortless.

Leap Frog: Letter Factory is truly a *must have.*
reviews.title: Leap Frog: Letter Factory a must have!
